attributes.action: flying of union Jack on Belfast city hall
attributes.additional_details:
I propose this petition to put the Union Jack back on top of Belfast City Hall 365 days a year.

Living in Northern Ireland I feel discrimated for being a protestant.

We live in the United kingdom so therefor the Union Jack should be flown high.

Down in the South of Ireland they can fly their tricolour on their city hall with pride!

We are discriminated against and we always have been in our own country, getting our marching parades stopped while the nationalists can name a play park, March on a nationalist parade wherever they please and commemorate an IRA bomber with a wall plaque!!!!!

Not to mention making bombs and still leaving them for people to get killed.

We get frowned upon for doing the littlest of things so that we can feel a part of civilization!

Protestantism is a dying breed and need someone to set the law straight so they don't have their human rights, pride and dignity taking away from them all together!

Put back the Union Jack!
